#summary @constructor

== The @constructor Tag ==

The @constructor tag marks an function as being a constructor, meant to be called with the `new` keyword to return an instance.

=== Syntax ===
{{{
@constructor
}}}

=== Examples ===

{{{
/**
    Creates a new Person.
    @constructor 
*/ 
Person = function() {
}

var p = new Person();
}}}

=== See Also ===
  * The [TagClass @class] tag can also be used to mark a function as being a constructor.
  * The [TagConstructs @constructs] tag can be used in combination with the [TagLends @lends] tag.
